data.name: Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove Soundtrack Collection
data.detailed_description:
Shovel Knight is a sweeping classic action adventure game with awesome gameplay, memorable characters, and an 8-bit retro aesthetic. The soundtrack played a critical role in the game since day one and continues to be a pillar of each new game! From the heroic beginnings of Shovel of Hope, to the mischievous machinations of Plague of Shadows, and the somber tones of Specter of Torment.

Composer Jake Kaufman used freely available hobbyist tools to write the soundtrack and program all the sound effects, resulting in 4 hours of music that can actually be played on a real NES / Famicom console!

Joining him is the legendary Manami Matsumae, who created the music and sound effects for the original Mega Man - one of the greatest soundtracks of all time - and inspired Jake and countless other composers to start their own careers in game music.

It is our hope that these soundtracks might someday inspire a young composer or two to do the same.

The Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove Soundtrack collection includes the following albums:
  • Shovel Knight Original Soundtrack
  • Shovel Knight: Plague of Shadows Original Soundtrack
  • Shovel Knight: Specter of Torment Original Soundtrack

Once downloaded, MP3 files can be found in the Shovel Knight Steam directory as well as played from within the Steam Music Player!
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Shovel Knight\Original Soundtrack

data.short_description: Music is a big part of Shovel Knight! From the heroic Shovel of Hope to the somber Specter of Torment. Jake Kaufman used hobbyist tools to write the soundtrack, resulting in 4 hours of music that can be played on a real NES/Famicom console! Joining him is the legendary Manami Matsumae!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
